attributes.action: not introduce new restrictions limiting the amount of information which can be obtained under the Freedom of Information Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Less than 2 years after the FOI Act's introduction, the government has published proposals that would severely limit the amount of information that could be obtained under the Act.

rejection.details:
There is already similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/freeinformation/
if you still want your own petition launched, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
